Body:
"""
        Tests for read_from_PDB()
        """
atom = structure.Atom.read_from_PDB(line)
assert atom.coords == pytest.approx(expected)
pytest.mark.parametrize('line, expected', ((
    'ATOM    512  N   GLU A  32      -1.870  -9.835  -1.853  1.00  0.56           N  '
    , [-1.87, -9.835, -1.853]), (
    'ATOM   1424  CA  SER A  89       7.604  11.308   1.435  1.00  0.62           C  '
    , [7.604, 11.308, 1.435]), (
    'ATOM   1167  CG2 VAL B  50       9.294  44.541  -4.830  1.00 27.62           C  '
    , [9.294, 44.541, -4.83])))
